description: scGen predicts single-cell perturbation responses | Single cell perturbation prediction | Generative modeling and latent space arithmetics predict single-cell perturbation response across cell types, studies and species | This repository includes python scripts in code and notebooks in the Jupyter Notebooks folder to reproduce figures from the paper (bioRxiv, 2018) according to the table bellow | A tensorflow implementation of scGen. scGen is a generative model to predict single-cell perturbation response across cell types, studies and species (Nature Methods, 2019)  | Jupyter Notebooks/SupplFig1.ipynb | Jupyter Notebooks/SupplFig2.ipynb
name: scGen
